name: Myopic
description:
Explore the 2D world and find a way out.

Myopic is a 2D Puzzle Platformer that involves a cube traversing through platforming levels and solving puzzles but with bleached vision / limited vision. The game revolves around this core mechanic making the obstacles somewhat INVISIBLE to the player which increases the challenge further. The player needs to find a way to get to the End Point to go to the next level and thus progress in the game.
